Uses of Class
com.sri.kernel.modules.ModuleInfo

Packages that use ModuleInfo
com.sri.kernel Provides the core classes of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.kernel.modules Contains classes which make up the module system of the SR4 Kernel. 
 

Uses of ModuleInfo in com.sri.kernel
 

Methods in com.sri.kernel with parameters of type ModuleInfo
 boolean Diagnostics.diagnoseModule(ModuleInfo mi)
          Performs diagnostic on the given Module Info [mi] using the level DIAG_DEFAULT.
 boolean Diagnostics.diagnoseModule(ModuleInfo mi, int level)
          Performs diagnostic on Module Info [mi] using the level [level] Equivilent of calling diagnoseModule(mi.getModuleName(), mi.getModule(), level);
 

Uses of ModuleInfo in com.sri.kernel.modules
 

Methods in com.sri.kernel.modules that return ModuleInfo
 ModuleInfo ModuleList.initLoad(java.lang.String moduleName)
          This will initialize the loading process of a module.
 ModuleInfo ModuleList.getModuleInfo(java.lang.String moduleName)
          Returns the ModuleInfo object associated with [moduleName].
